name: tienda-loyalty-system
description: Hybrid loyalty enrollment system with receipt monitoring

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:electron
scripts.dev: npm run kill:processes && timeout 3 >nul && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:electron"
scripts.kill:processes: (taskkill /F /FI "IMAGENAME eq python.exe" /FI "COMMANDLINE eq *main.py*" 2>nul || echo.) && (taskkill /F /FI "IMAGENAME eq electron.exe" 2>nul || echo.) && echo Process cleanup completed

author: Tienda Software Team
